main event: A bright white light hovered 30 to 50 yards away from the observer and then took off at a terrific rate of speed.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright white light that hovered near the observer.
The object took off at an extremely fast speed.
The report was considered unreliable due to the observer's high amount of imagination.
The observer estimated the object's size to be about the size of a basketball.
The observer reported hearing a sound like a whistle coming from the object.
